sources.title: I Conquer the Sea
sources.description: 1936 was a different world in Newfoundland - the bigotry and the unexpected ending will give you plenty to talk about and think about in this forgotten masterpiece of human drama.

sources.title: I Conquer the Sea! (1936) ADVENTURE
sources.description:
Stars: Steffi Duna, Dennis Morgan, Douglas Walton
 Director: Victor Halperin

 In a Newfoundland whaling village, a love triangle develops among two brothers and a woman.

metadata.Plot: The captain of a fishing boat loses his arm while out at sea. He determines not to let the loss ruin his life and goes back to sea as a one-armed sailor.
metadata.Writer: Richard Carroll, Howard Higgin, Rollo Lloyd
metadata.Actors: Steffi Duna, Dennis Morgan, Douglas Walton
